summary: Sharing some of the custom resources I've made for my College of Winterhold overhaul.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#980000][color=#ffff00][size=4]See this art used in:[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84004/?]Apepi's Better College of Winterhold[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4221/?]ABCoW: Special Edition Version[/url][/color]

[b]This zip contains:[/b]
[list]
[*]Meshes
[*]Textures
[*]An example ESP that can be merged into another mod. All assets implemented as statics and names start with [i]apepi_[/i]
[/list]
[b]Why:[/b]
Spent a lot of time making things for my own mod. I'm really happy with it and I wanted to share.

[b]Details & Credits:[/b]
[list]
[*]Open books and art frames are inspired by and based on Blary's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/?]Open Books[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30602/?]Ingrediant Wall Art[/url].
[*]The anatomical studies from Da Vinci's sketch books.
[*]Two of the wall hangings are from TES4: Oblivion's Oghma Infinium/Mysterium Xarxes
[*]Three wall hangings are from TES5: Skyrim's Shalidor's Insights and A Minor Maze.
[*]The dwemer related items were created by me, but are based on pieces from TES3: Morrowind. [url=http://apepiofduat.deviantart.com/gallery/]dA Gallery[/url] for more specific details on individual pieces.
[/list]
[b]Tools Used:[/b]
[list]
[*]Creation Kit
[*]Photoshop + nVidia DDS plugin
[*]Paint Tool SAI
[*]nifskope
[/list][b]
Permissions:
[/b]A link back here is all I ask.Â  Please, do leave a message if you use this! I'd love to see other people's work!
author: ApepiofDuat
